title: Introduction to SearchEngine
description: This search engine is a fast search engine for .NET with fuzzy search support.

title: Fuzzy Search Explained
description: Fuzzy search allows typos such as apllon or apolon to still be found.

title: BM25 Ranking
description: BM25 is a ranking algorithm for full-text search engines.

title: N-Gram Index
description: An N-Gram index speeds up fuzzy matching significantly.

title: ASP.NET Web API
description: ASP.NET Core works well for building search APIs.
